entry.value: insert into $db$.$tb$ (deeplink_id, deeplink_md5, linkedme_key, identity_id, appid, create_time, tags, alias, channel, feature, stage, campaign, params, source, sdk_version, link_label, ios_use_default, ios_custom_url, android_use_default, android_custom_url, desktop_use_default, desktop_custom_url, update_time) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, now())

select deeplink_id, create_time, tags, alias, channel, feature, stage, campaign, source, ios_use_default, ios_custom_url, android_use_default, android_custom_url, desktop_use_default, desktop_custom_url from $db$.$tb$ where appid = ? and valid_status = '1'

update $db$.$tb$ set appid = ?, ios_use_default = ?, ios_custom_url = ?, android_use_default = ?, android_custom_url = ?, desktop_use_default = ?, desktop_custom_url = ?, feature = ?, campaign = ?, stage = ?, channel = ?, tags = ?, source = ?, params = ? where deeplink_id = ? and appid = ? and valid_status = '1'
